pr_title: Combine ManifestReaders into one parameterized class

timeline.message: Combine ManifestReaders into one parameterized class.

timeline.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: Does this mean we can only do rewrites if there are no DeleteFile's?
timeline.author: danielcweeks

replies.bodyText: Never mind, I see that the rewrite is only operating on the data manifests and not all manifests.
replies.author: danielcweeks
